sentences.english: Beings in this layer of heaven have ended the causes that led to suffering and abide in extreme bliss.
sentences.chinese: 因爲在這一層天的人，苦因已經盡了，樂非常住。

definition: the Four Noble Truths (Budd.), namely: all life is suffering 苦, the cause of suffering is desire 集, emancipation comes only by eliminating passions 滅|灭, the way 道 to emancipation is the Eight-fold Noble Way 八正道/also called 四諦|四谛
Western Pure Land of Ultimate Bliss or Sukhavati (Sanskrit)
pinyin: xi1 fang1 ji2 le4 shi4 jie4

definition: to be reborn/to live in paradise (Buddhism)/to die/(after) one's death
the Four Noble Truths (Buddhism)/see also 四諦|四谛[si4 di4] and 苦集滅道|苦集灭道[ku3 ji2 mie4 dao4]
to extinguish worries and the sea of grief/nirvana (Buddhism)
Hinayana, the Lesser Vehicle/Buddhism in India before the Mayahana sutras/also pr. [Xiao3 cheng2]
